resources.string: You can restore files from the TRASH
You cannot upload more than 20 files at once
The file size cannot be more than 100 megabytes
You can upload only when Wi-Fi is enabled
We have significantly updated ONLYOFFICE Documents for Android. Swipe to learn more.
Create and edit text documents, spreadsheets and presentations on ONLYOFFICE portal.
Share docs to your team granting full access, review or read only rights. Sharing via external link available as well.
Co-edit office documents with your teammates in real time.
Connect the app to other cloud storages you use: Google Drive, Dropbox, Nextcloud, etc.
Install an authenticator app to generate access codes (e.g. Google Authenticator, Authy) to continue working with your portal
Run the app and tap the new account icon
Copy the key and paste it to your authenticator app
Type the code from your authenticator app to the input field
File with the same name exists.
File has been deleted or is not available from this account.
This account does not have access to the project
%1$s file already exists in the destination directory.
Clear cache?\nThis operation will free up space on your device by deleting temporary files. Your offline files and personal data won\'t be removed.
Collaborate in secure environment and connect third-party storages
Store documents in the cloud and collaborate on them

User with %1$s from the %2$s portal will be logged out and removed from the account list. \n\nPlease, note: to log in, you\'ll need to enter portal address, email and password. All your files will be safe.
Are you sure to log out?
After you log out, you won\'t need to enter your portal address or email, only the password. Don\'t worry, all the files will be safe in the cloud.
Need to grant access to the files. If access is denied all files after lost applications will be deleted.
- this is code which requested at application start.\n\nPay attention! If you forget passcode you have to remove or reinstall application. All documents on device will be lost.

plurals.item: All shared links in room will become active, and its contents will be available to everyone with the link. Do you want to restore room?
All shared links in rooms will become active, and its contents will be available to everyone with the link. Do you want to restore rooms?

resources.string: This room and all its contents are available to anyone with the link. Do you want to continue?
This room is available to anyone with the link. External users will have View Only permission for all the files.
Link successfully created and copied to clipboard
The maximum number of links has been exceeded
Links to all files in the room will be deleted. Previous links to room files and embedded documents will become unavailable.\n\nThis action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
Links to all files in the room will be re-generated. Previous links to room files and embedded documents will become unavailable.\n\nThis action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
The link has expired and has been disabled
Restrict file content copy, file download and printing
Enable this setting to disable downloads of files and folders from this room shared via a link
Are you sure you want to save and exit?
Provide access to the document and set the permission levels.
The link is valid for unlimited
Access rights for all users in the group

The content of third party folder are not available. Try to reconnect the account.
Log in to the portal account %1$s to open the document.
Now application is using english language because of the system language has changed
The document you open is not OOXML (Office Open XML) file. Convert it to OOXML format for faster viewing and editing.
ONLYOFFICE Personal will be discontinued on September 1st, 2024.\nWe recommend you move to the free ONLYOFFICE DocSpace Cloud.
Fill in the fields of the original form in the editor window.
Share your form and collect responses via a Form filling room.
The filled PDF form is saved and available to you in the Complete folder. To check the status, contact the form owner providing the assigned number.
Use VDR for advanced file security and transparency while filling and signing documents step-by-step. Set watermarks, automatically index and track all content, restrict downloading and copying.
"Set file lifetime to automatically delete the files in this room after a defined period. Lifetime begins on the date of upload/creation of the file."
Older files with exceeded lifetime will be deleted
Lifetime countdown begins at the file creation date. Some files in this room exceed the proposed lifetime and will be deleted once you enable the setting.
Enable this setting to disable downloads, printing, and content copying for users with the “Viewer” role
Protect all documents in this room with watermarks. If a document already contains one, it will not be replaced.
Enable automatic indexing to index files and folders by serial number. Sorting by number will be set as default for all users.
Storage quota set per room. You can change this value or turn off storage limit.
This image preview roughly shows how the watermark will be displayed in your files.
The file lifetime is set to %1d %2s in this room
Items in Trash are automatically deleted after 30 days
The file will be deleted on %s
Exit without saving?\nYou have made changes in the index. If you proceed without saving, those changes will not be applied.
The Reorder action will remove spaces in the indexes. The files will be re-indexed in order with offset to fill in missing indexes.
